name: STUDENT DASHBOARD
description: What Is STUDENT DASHBOARD: A Notion student dashboard is a customizable tool that allows students to manage and organize their academic responsibilities. It can be used to keep track of assignments, deadlines, course schedules, and notes. The dashboard provides a centralized location for all of a student's academic materials, making it easy to stay on top of coursework and stay organized throughout the semester.How to use Student Dashboard : The Student Dashboard Notion template is a comprehensi
features: ASSIGNMENTS; Pomodoro widget (JAPAN THEME); WEEKLY ASSIGNMENTS VIEW; PERSONAL TASKS; notes capture
